verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In bread we bring you Lord, Our bodies labour
In wine we offer you our spirits food;

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We do not ask you Lord who is my neighbour, But stand united now one in belief.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh we have gladly heard your word your holy word and now in answer Lord,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: our gift we bringOur selfish hearts make true, our failing faith renew,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Our lives belong to you,Our Lord and king..

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: The bread we offer you is blessed and broken, And it becomes for us our spirits food

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Over the cup we bring,your word is spoken, make it your gift to us, your healing blood

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Take all that daily toil, plant in our hearts poor soil
Take all we start and spoil each hopefuill dream

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
The chances we have missed, the graces we resist
Lord in thy eucharist take and reddem.
